feature.name: camel-dns
feature.details: The camel-dns feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to ddd the package sun.net.spi.nameservice to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-hbase
feature.details: Hadoop does not currently work properly in OSGi environment.

feature.name: camel-hdfs
feature.details: Hadoop does not currently work properly in OSGi environment.
